description: Introduction and explaining the theme of "Cultivating an Atmosphere of Kindness"

Building on Bren√© Brown's popularized principle, let's explore how we can each cultivate more clarity in our communication to enhance our kindness. How can we say true things, even hard ones, in ways that are kind?
I will be speaking on the Atmosphere of Kindness that I have felt over the past two years during my trips to summit mountains, cross glaciers, and build a relationship with my brother.

talkTitle: How to be kind and win at business
description: Basic rules of propriety such the Golden Rule, "If you can't say anything nice don't say anything at all" and "If you can't say it to someone's face you shouldn't be saying it" apply in a business environment and you can still "win" and feel good.
